recipes.name: Egg Roll in a Bowl
recipes.notes: Add udon or egg noodles. Use ground turkey.

recipes.name: Indian Butter Chicken
recipes.notes: Use coconut milk instead of cream

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.notes: Sub Greek yogurt for sour cream. No mushrooms.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Soup
recipes.notes: Serve with French bread or sourdough

recipes.name: Korean BBQ Chicken
recipes.notes: 8 hr marinate. Add rice and veggies.

recipes.name: Lemon Herb Chicken
instructions: Season chicken with salt and pepper.
Place chicken in baking dish with lemon and herbs.
Roast for 35 minutes until cooked through.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Toss pasta with vegetables and parmesan.
Season with salt, pepper, and fresh basil.

recipes.name: Honey Garlic Salmon
instructions: Mix honey, soy sauce, and minced garlic.
Place salmon in baking dish, pour glaze over.
